attributes.action: Appoint Faye Turney captain of the English cricket team
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the grounds that even she -- just --  has demonstrated more backbone than the collection of inebriated pedalo pushers who represented us in the West Indies, we hereby petition to prime minister to use his (waning) influence and request the ECB to appoint leading seaman Faye Turney the new captain of the English cricket team.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
